prompt.content: Using NVIDIA’s (NASDAQ: NVDA) Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended January 26, 2025, calculate NVIDIA’s FY 2025 EV/EBITDA, expressed as a ratio rounded to 2 decimals.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"FY2025 EBIT (operating income) = $81,453 million as input","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2025 depreciation and amortization (D&A) = $1,864 million as input","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"calculate FY2025 EBITDA correctly as: EBIT + D&A = $83,317 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total shares outstanding = 24,477 million as input"},{"criteria":"pull latest NVDA close price per share on January 24, 2025 = $142.59","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"calculate market cap as total shares outstanding x share price: 24,477 million × $142.59 = $3,490,175.43 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"pull total debt = $8,463 million as input"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"pull cash and cash equivalents = $8,589 million as input"},{"criteria":"pull marketable securities = $34,621 million as input","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"calculate Enterprise Value correctly as $3,490,175.43 million + $8,463 million − $8,589 million − $34,621 million = $3,455,428.43 million"},{"criteria":"FY2025 EV/EBITDA = $3,455,428.43 million ÷ $83,317 million = 41.47×.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Round final answer to two decimal points: 41.47×","operator":"correctness"}]
